cast.original_title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
cast.overview: The wife of an abusive criminal finds solace in the arms of a kind regular guest in her husband's restaurant.
cast.title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover

details.biography:
Tony Alleff was a talented and accomplished actor, leaving an indelible mark on the world of cinema with his impressive performances in a diverse range of films.

His most notable roles include the iconic 1983 film "Never Say Never Again", where he showcased his acting prowess alongside a star-studded cast.

In 1989, he appeared in the critically acclaimed "The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover", a film that pushed the boundaries of cinematic storytelling and explored themes of love, power, and morality.

Earlier in his career, Alleff had already made a name for himself with his breakout role in the 1980 film "Watch All Night", a thriller that kept audiences on the edge of their seats with its suspenseful plot and memorable characters.
details.name: Tony Alleff
